text: #Preds Head Coach John Hynes says David Rittich will start tonight in Game 1 against the Avalanche. #StanleyCup
Its Rittich. (Hes starting his 13th game of the season tonight in net) We trust him and believe in him. Coach Hynes of the Preds https://t.co/qy70vpElQa
David Rittich starts game 1 for the #Preds tonight.  Linus Ullmark will start game 2 for the #NHLBruins.
